questions.question: In how many ways can 4 couples be seated at a round table if the men and women want to sit alternately?
If you have 9 different books and want to place them on a shelf, in how many different ways can you arrange them?

A shopping mall has a straight row of 5 flagpoles at its main entrance. It has 3 identical green flags and 2 identical yellow flags. How many distinct arrangements of flags on the flagpoles are possible?
A bag contains 6 red balls and 4 blue balls. If 3 balls are drawn at random without replacement, what is the probability of drawing exactly 2 red balls and 1 blue ball?
How many different 5-letter words can be formed from the letters of the word 'BANANA'? (Consider any arrangement of letters as a word, whether meaningful or not)
In how many different ways can 5 people be seated at a circular table? (Seating arrangements are considered the same if one can be obtained from the other by rotation)
From a standard deck of 52 cards, in how many ways can you select 5 cards to form a full house (3 cards of one rank and 2 cards of another rank)?
How many different bit strings of length 8 contain exactly 3 ones?
